title: have friends see you as not online when you are
body: is there anyway to block users in a way that they cannot see that you are online even though you are?

replies.body:
You can appear offline to all your friends while actually being online if you use a league of legends chat app. Personally, I use one found on the android market. These let you customize your display fields (status, level, wins, etc.) If you log out of the app while still logged in on your computer, it will appear to everyone in your friends list that you are offline even though you can still participate in chat and accept games.

This is by no means officially supported by Riot, but you may find it useful.
Well technically 3rd party program called, Appear offline for league of legends that makes you appear offline to everyone, you can toggle it however to be invited to a match then go back offline.

Hey carlaysayhey!

I think what you are referring to is a way to go "invisible".  However, it looks like you are referring to a more targeted version where you only appear offline to certain individuals.  Unfortunately, this feature does not exist in the League of Legends Friends List.  The "appear invisible" feature is something that has been requested by the community, and it is something that we have taken under consideration.  Although, please keep in mind that I can make no guarantee as to whether it will ever be implemented.

I do sincerely apologize if this causes any inconvenience!
